players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia, because he didn't speak. I didn't kill Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. They know I'm detective. Vote Charlie."
You: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is mafia. Bob is innocent."
Diana: "..."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob, you were silent because you were careful. Diana, maybe you misinterpreted. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
You: "I think Bob is the mafia, because he didn't speak. I didn't kill Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. They know I'm detective. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is mafia. Bob is innocent."
Diana: "..."
You: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob, you were silent because you were careful. Diana, maybe you misinterpreted. Vote Bob."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia, because he didn't speak. I didn't kill Alice."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. They know I'm detective. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is mafia. Bob is innocent."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob, you were silent because you were careful. Diana, maybe you misinterpreted. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
